translations.logoutConfirmationMessage: If you log out, you will need to login again with the internet to continue using the app.
translations.lessThanTenCannotBePregnant: Less than 10 year old cannot be pregnant
translations.acidityMedsNotToBeGivenToChildren: Acidity medicine should not be given to children
translations.maleCannotBeEnrolledInMotherProgram: Male cannot be enrolled in mother program
translations.individualWithoutChildrenCannotBeEnrolle: Individual without children cannot be enrolled in mother program
translations.lowerThanAgeOfBeingAMother: Individuals less than 11 years old cannot be registered in mother program
translations.parityCannotBeGreaterThanGravida: Parity cannot be greater than gravida
translations.abortionsCannotBeGreaterThanGravida: Number of abortions cannot be greater than gravida
translations.parityPlusAbortionCannotBeGreaterThanGra: Parity + Abortions cannot be greater than gravida
translations.RequiredValidContactNumber: Only numbers,(,+,-,), and spaces are allowed
translations.Reason for School Dropout Vulnerability: Reason(s) for Risk Of School Dropout
translations.Reason for Early Marriage Vulnerability: Reason(s) for Risk Of Early Marriage
translations.Reason for Early Pregnancy & RTI Vulnera: Reason(s) for Risk Of Early Pregnancy
translations.Reason for Road Traffic Accident Vulnera: Reason(s) for Risk Of Road Traffic Accident
translations.CK Registration counselling:
Counsel accordingly if 
 - chews tobacco,
 - takes alcohol or
 - uses drug
translations.CK Diet Advice Dos:
Diet DOs
✓ Eat complete, balanced diet
✓ Eat multiple meals (3-4 times) in a day
✓ Eat many fruits
✓ Have milk, eggs, chicken, fish, meat regularly
✓ Have green leafy vegetables
✓ Use only adequately iodised salt
translations.CK Complete diet advice: Advice to Eat complete, balanced diet
translations.CK Diet Advice Donts:
Diet DONTs
✘ Excessive consumption of Tea
translations.CK Rest and sleep:
Rest and sleep
✓ Avoid strenous work throughout pregnancy period
translations.CK Counselling for child being sick righ: Please counsel and refer to doctor/hospital if necessary
translations.Counselling checklist for No Parents / S:
Checklist - Information to be given about
 1. Government schemes - How to get benefits, which documents are required.
 2. Scholarship
 3. Importance of Education
translations.Counselling checklist for Menstrual Diso:
Checklist - Information to be given about
 1. 70% girls have some kind of discomfort worldwide.
 2. Take tablet to subside menstrual cramps, it has no side effects.
 3. Use home remedies like drinking tea or lamonade to feel better.
 4. Drink plenty of fluids.
 5. Consult a doctor whenever you require.
 6. Maintain hyigiene while menstruating.
translations.Counselling checklist for Severe Anemia:
Checklist - Information to be given about
 1. You must eat green leafy vegetables.
 2. You should consume iron rich foods like dates, eggplants, jaggery.
 3. Take IFA tablets regularly for 3 months.
translations.Counselling checklist for Malnutrition:
Checklist - Information to be given about
 1. Eat balanced diet.
 2. Eat all types of food.
 3. Eat fruits and vegetables in a good amount.
 4. Water is very important for digestion.
translations.Counselling checklist for Sickle Cell An:
Checklist - Information to be given about
 1. This is a genetic disorder of hemoglobin, commonly seen among tribals.
 2. You must get all your femily members tested for Sickle cell.
 3. You must marry to a Sickle cell negative /normal person to prevent the disease affect the future generations.
 4. You can lead a normal life without any symptom of the disease.

Checklist - Information to be given about Sickle Cell Anemia(Disease)
 1. Drink plenty of water.
 2. Do not work heavily in sunlight.
 3. Consult a doctor whenever you fall sick.
 4. Always keep painkiller tablet with you and use it whenever there is a pain.
translations.Counselling checklist for Addiction:
Checklist
 1. Addiction is harmful for self, family and society.
 2. Addiction causes cancer.
 3. Laws and acts related to smoking / drinking.
 4. Addiction can cause financial crisis.
 5. Say NO to substances like bidi, gutka, cigarette, tobacco or alcohol.
translations.Counselling checklist for RTI:
Checklist - Information to be given about RTI
 1. Use contraceptives like condoms or pills.
 2. Be faithful to your partner.
 3. There will be risk of transmitting HIV or STDs.
 4. HIV can lead to AIDS.
 5. Say NO to unprotected sex.
translations.Counselling checklist for Road Traffic A:
Checklist - Information to be given about
 1. Licence is mandatory for driving vehicle
 2. You are eligible for getting driving licence after age of 16.
 3. Always wear helmet while driving.
 4. Do not overtake from wrong side.
 5. Do not drink and drive.
 6. Always indicate prior to turn left or right.
translations.Counselling checklist for dropout:
Checklist - 
1. It is very important to complete the secondary education.
2. Education will empower you financially and socially.
3. Information about scholarships.
translations.Counselling checklist for CK pregnancy e:
Next steps - 
 1. Provide Iron Folate and Calcium Supplements
 2. Complete SES form
 3. Fill out and hand over MCPC Card
 4. Take photograph
 5. advised to go to clinic
translations.Mother program enrolment with TB recomme:
TB - If on medication, ask/check whether having it regularly or not.  If not regularly taking the medicines, then send an individual to the hospital for rechecking.
 Ask for complition of treatment in case of TB diagnosis more than 6 months. If not completed the proper treatment, then send an individual to the hospital of rechecking
translations.Keep the baby warm detailed advice: Keep the baby warm by giving mother's skin to skin contact and covering the baby's head, hands and feet with a cap, gloves and socks resp.
translations.Advice about reading card: Please give the woman the laminated reading card and ask her to read the passage in the language of her choice
translations.Principal occupation of the household: Principal occupation of the household (Out of the three income earners, identify who is the principal occupation holder, then tick):
translations.Diet Advice Dos:
Diet DOs
✓ Eat complete, balanced diet
✓ Eat multiple meals (3-4 times) in a day
✓Eat many fruits
✓ Have milk, eggs, chicken, fish, meat regularly
✓ Have green leafy vegetables
✓ Consume THR (Take Home Ration) from the Anganwadi Center regularly
✓ Use only adequately iodised salt
translations.Diet Advice Donts:
Diet DONTs
✘ Avoid Kharra, Guthkha, Areca nut
✘ Avoid Tadi, Gorga, Alcohol 
✘ Excessive consumption of Tea
translations.Supplementary nutritional therapy:
Supplementary nutritional therapy
✓ FS+Calcium Tablets regular consumption
✓ Tablets given by CHWs and or by doctors from the hospital should be consumed regularly
translations.Rest and sleep:
Rest and sleep
✓ 8 hours complete sleep during night and minimum 2 hours rest at day time
✘ Avoid Strenous work in 1st and 3rd trimester
translations.Immunization Counselling:
Immunization
✓ TT Vaccination is important as T.T. immunization protects the mother and the baby against tetanus – a life threatening disease
translations.Coitus/Sex Counselling:
Coitus/Sex
✓ Safe to have sex only in 2nd trimester
✘ NO sex during 1st and 3rd trimester
translations.Illness management:
Illness
✘ Do not take any kind of medicine without an advice of doctor/nurse/health worker
✘ Do not expose to X-ray without Doctor's advice
translations.Finance management:
Money
✓ Save adequate money to meet the expenses during emergency
translations.Government scheme information:
Government scheme
✓ Ask ANM or ASHA for enrolment in JSY scheme. Enrolling in this scheme assures financial assistance to pregnant women
translations.Ambulance services information:
Ambulance services
✓ For any emergency during pregnancy contact 102/108/104
translations.Child post natal discussion topics LBW:
• Care of baby
• Care of Low Birth Weight baby
• Breastfeeding vs. Formula feeding
• Complimentary feeding
• Child Growth and Development
• Immunizations
translations.Child post natal discussion topics:
• Care of baby
• Breastfeeding vs. Formula feeding
• Complimentary feeding
• Child Growth and Development
• Immunizations
translations.Counselling for feeding your child frequ: Counselling Advice for feeding your child frequently throughout the day
translations.Child PNC Discussion items:
Postnatal care for child
• Care of newborn baby
• Care of LBW baby (if applicable)
• Care of premature baby (if applicable)
• Breastfeeding
• Immunizations
translations.ANC discussion item 1:
• Normal symptoms of pregnancy
• Pregnancy complications and danger signs
translations.Rest and sleep advice Dos:
Rest and sleep DOs
✓ Enough Rest and sleep
translations.Rest and sleep advice Donts:
Rest and sleep DONTs
✘ Avoid heavy physical activities
translations.Supplementary nutritional therapy advice:
Supplementary nutritional therapy
✓ Take IFA and Calcium tablets for three months
translations.Breast Feeding advice:
Breast Feeding
✓ Exlusive Breast feeding to the baby upto 6 months
✓ Advise the mother about proper Breast feeding positions
translations.Hygiene advice:
Hygiene
✓ Maintain proper hygiene to prevent infection of mother and baby
✓ Wash the perineum daily and after passing stools
✓ Take bath daily
✓ Wash the hands before and after handling the baby, especially after cleaning and before feeding the baby
translations.Immunization advice:
Immunization
✓ Complete immunization of the baby
translations.Family Planning advice Dos:
Family Planning DOs
✓ Advise the couple on birth spacing or limiting the size of the family
translations.Family Planning advice Donts:
Family Planning DONTs
✘ Avoid Sexual intercourse till 6 weeks or till perineal wound heals
translations.Importance of Keeping the baby warm: Importance of Keeping the baby warm
translations.Keeping the baby warm Dos:
DOs
✓ Keep the child warm
✓ Kangaroo Mother care: Skin to skin contact with mother and exclusive breast feeding
translations.Keeping the baby warm Donts:
DONTs
✘ Don't bath baby in 1st 48 hours of birth
translations.Breast Feeding Dos:
Breast feeding DOs
✓ Start breastfeeding soon after birth within 1 hour of birth
✓ First 6 months only Breast feeding
✓ No limit for breastfeeding. Ideally breast feeding every after 2 hours and minimum 2 feedings during night
translations.Breast Feeding Donts:
Breast feeding DONTs
✘ No other food, liquid, or water till 6 months of child's age
translations.Hygiene Dos:
Hygiene DOs
✓ Keep Umbilical cord dry and uncovered
✓ Wipe off any meconium or blood from the baby's skin
translations.Hygiene Donts:
Hygiene DONTs
✘ Don't apply any substance to the umbilical cord
translations.Child's Weight Dos:
Child's weight DOs
✓ Essential to weigh baby at birth
✓ If baby weighs less than 2.5 kg, it is essential to take special care of baby
translations.Registration Dos:
Registration DOs
✓ Birth registration
✓ Anganwadi registration
translations.Child PNC - Baby warming - Dos:
Dos
✓ Keep the child warm
✓ Kangaroo Mother care: Skin to skin contact with mother and exclusive breast feeding
translations.Child PNC - Breastfeeding - Dos:
Dos
✓ Start breastfeeding soon after birth within 1 hour of birth
✓ First 6 months only Breast feeding
✓ No limit for breastfeeding. Ideally breast feeding every after 2 hours and minimum 2 feedings during night
translations.Child PNC - Hygiene - Dos:
Dos
✓ Keep Umbilical cord dry and uncovered
✓ Wipe off any meconium or blood from the baby's skin
translations.Child PNC - Weight - Dos:
Dos
✓ Essential to weigh baby at birth
✓ If baby weighs less than 2.5 kg, it is essential to take special care of baby
translations.Child PNC - Registration Immunisation -:
Dos
✓ Birth registration
✓ Anganwadi registration
✓ Receive immunization at birth
translations.BT check reason: Sickle cell test within 90 days after a blood transfusion may lead to inaccurate test results.
translations.BT check failed revisit instruction: Revisit in 3 months after the BT date.
translations.Missed periods and not done UPT counsell: Since the woman has missed her period and not done UPT so far, provide counseling using MCH card no 1
translations.IHMP FP counselling to delay first conce: Use FP card no 1,2,3,4 and counsel to delay first conception till she becomes 20 years of age, and use FP card 6,7 and 9 to provide information regarding diffrent options of FP methods
translations.IHMP FP counselling for spacing to non u: Use FP card no 5 to counsel woman regarding spacing for at least three years, use FP cards 6 ,7,8,9,10,11 to provide information regarding diffrent options of FP methods
translations.IHMP FP counselling for spacing to user: Counsel woman to continue using the present method for spacing of three years between two child births
translations.IHMP FP counselling for spacing to desir: Use FP card no 5 to counsel woman regarding spacing for at least three years, use FP cards 6 ,7,8,9,10,11 to provide information regarding diffrent options of FP methods
translations.IHMP FP counselling information regardin: Use card no 13 & 14 to provide information on sterlization operation
translations.IHMP IPIL counselling: If woman reports unprotected sex and unwanted pregnancy then counsel woman on use of IPIL using FP card no 15
translations.IHMP Recommendation for RTI symptoms:
1) Refer her to the nearest facility where treatment of RTI is available.
2) Counsel her on regarding risk of not taking treatment.
translations.IHMP Pregnancy PNC Diet Counselling: ✓ Counsel mother regarding need for postnatal examinations, IFA consumption, balanced diet and rest for mother and neonate using card no 10
translations.IHMP Pregnancy PNC Complications Counsel:
If a woman reports any postnatal complication at any point of time to the ASHA
✓ Cousel her regarding solution and refer her to appropriate facility
translations.IHMP ASHA counselling for pregnancy conf:
Counselling for pregnancy confirmed and not registered for ANC
✓Use MCH card number 1 and counsel her to get herself registered for antenatal care
translations.IHMP ASHA counselling for monthly antena:
Counselling for monthly antenatal checkup
✓Use MCH card number 2 & 3 - Educate the woman regarding the 11 complications during pregnancy and counsel her to inform the ASHA if she notices any complication. Counsel her that these complications can arise any woman at any time and tell her importance of monthly antenatal check up
translations.IHMP ASHA counselling during every conta:
Counselling during every contact
✓Use MCH card number 4 - Counsel her regarding need specific (refer summary) antenatal services
✓Use MCH card number 5 to counsel her about  care during pregnancy at household level  - diet, rest, workload and breast care

Counselling during every contact post 7th month
✓Use MCH card number 6 to counsel the pregnant mother regarding preparations for delivery
✓Use MCH card number 7 to inform the women regarding potential complications during delivery and hence importance of hospital delivery
translations.IHMP ASHA counselling regarding preparat:
Counselling regarding preparations for delivery
✓Use MCH card number 6 to counsel the pregnant mother regarding preparations for delivery
✓Use MCH card number 7 to inform the woman regarding potential complications during delivery and hence importance of hospital delivery
translations.IHMP ASHA counselling during every conta:
Counselling during every contact post registration
✓Use MCH card number 8 to inform the pregnant mother regarding her entitlements such as JSY and Pradhanmantri Matrutva Vandan Yojana

Counselling during every contact post 8th month
✓Use FP card number 7 and 10 - Counsel pregnant woman to start using FP method such as condom, Copper T, or sterlization operation immediatly after delivery
translations.IHMP Diarrohea Counselling:
✓Give mother ORS 
✓Counsel her how to prepare ORS at home 
✓Counsel her regarding hand washing and food hygiene
translations.IHMP NNC Exclusive breastfeeding counsel: Use MCH card number 13 to counsel mother on immediate and exclusive breastfeeding, avoid all other top feeds including water unless there is failure of lactation.
translations.IHMP NNC Low Weight Counselling: Use MCH card number 11,12  and 13 - Counsel mother regarding cleanliness, keep neonate covered with warm cloths, cord care, breastfeeding every two hours, monitor weight of the child
translations.IHMP NNC Complication counselling: Take neonate directly to the hospital within 24 hours,  or in case treatment is going on then continue it
translations.Water is safe: The water is safe for drinking and cooking. Please inform all households to use this water source
translations.Water is unsafe: The water is unsafe for drinking or cooking. Please inform all households to stop using this water.
translations.waterQualityTestingAfterOverdueDateNotAl: Water quality testing after overdue date not allowed.
translations.nutritionSupplementsAfterOverdueDateNotA: Nutrition Supplements after overdue date not allowed.
translations.caAndMgSupplementsAfterOverdueDateNotAll: Ca And Mg Supplements after overdue date not allowed.
translations.UNICEF Preconception counselling for con: ✓ Counsel her and refer her to RH/CH for further investigations during pregnancy
translations.UNICEF Preconception counselling for age: ✓ Counsel her to delay pregnancy by using contraceptives
✓ Cousel her and refer her to PHC/RH/CH for further investigations and treatment
translations.Preconception baseline advice for diet: ✓ Diet advice to decrease or increase weight as per diet chart provided
translations.Preconception baseline counselling for p:
✓ Counsel her about different sterilization methods
✓ cousel her to visit PHC/RH/CH

✓ Counsel her about need of child spacing and using different sterilization methods
✓ counsel her to visit PHC/RH/CH
translations.Preconception baseline counselling for c: ✓ Counsel her about need of child spacing and using different sterilization methods
translations.Preconception baseline counselling for o: ✓ Counsel her about need of proper preconception care and refer her to PHC
translations.Preconception baseline counselling for c: ✓ Counsel her about need of proper preconception care
translations.Preconception baseline counselling for a: ✓ Counsel her about effects of alcohol consumption  on newborn and counsel her to quit alcohol consumption
translations.Preconception baseline counselling for t: ✓ Counsel her about effects of tobacco consumption on newborn and counsel her to quit tobacco consumption
translations.Preconception baseline counselling for c: ✓ Counsel her to increase whole cereals in diet
translations.Preconception baseline counselling for p: ✓ Counsel her to increase proteins- pulses, fruits, vegetables, soya, egg in diet
translations.Preconception Diet advice: ✓ Diet advice to decrease or increase weight as per diet chart
translations.Preconception Counselling regarding Anti: ✓ Counsel woman to visit PHC regarding taking Anti-D injection
translations.Preconception Counselling for sickle cel: ✓ Counsel her for sickle cell anaemia treatment
translations.Preconception Counselling both for VDRL: ✓ Counsel her and her husband, both for VDRL / infection treatment
translations.Preconception Counselling for other illn: ✓ Counsel her for other illness treatment
translations.maleEnrolmentToPreconceptionNotAllowed: Male Enrolment to Preconception not allowed
translations.MenstrualDisorderCounselling for SR:
✓ 70% girls have some kind of discomfort worldwide.
✓ Take tablet to subside menstrual cramps, it has no side effects.
✓ Use home remedies like drinking tea or lamonade to feel better.
✓ Drink plenty of fluids.
✓ Consult a doctor whenever you require.
✓ Maintain hyigiene while menstruating
translations.ChronicSicknessCounselling for SR:
✓ Maintain Personal hygine
✓ Prefer to eat home cooked food, and do not eat stale food
✓ Sleep properly for at least 8 hours
✓ Eat seasonal fruits if possible
✓ See the doctor if you are advised
translations.SR Is your complaint resolved counsellin: Refer once again if not cured
translations.SR SevereAnemiaCounselling:
✓ You must eat green leafy vegetables.
✓ You should consume iron rich foods like dates, jaggery, bajari.
✓ Take IFA tablets regularly for 3 months.
translations.IronTabletsMoreThanTwoDigitNotAllowed: Number of Iron tablets can not exceed two digits.
translations.Sewa Rural Sickle Cell Counselling:
✓ Drink plenty of water
✓ Do not work heavily in sunlight
✓ Consult a doctor whenever you fall sick
✓ Always keep painkiller tablet with you and use it whenever there is a pain
translations.Sewa Rural Addiction Counselling:
✓ Addiction is harmful for self, family and society
✓ Addiction causes cancer
✓ Laws and acts related to smoking / drinking
✓ Addiction can cause financial crisis
✓ Say NO to substances like bidi, gutka, cigarette, tobacco or alcohol
translations.SR ModerateAnemiaCounselling:
✓ You must eat green leafy vegetables.
✓ You should consume iron rich foods like dates, jaggery, bajari.
✓ Take IFA tablets regularly for 3 months.
translations.SR SevereMalnutritionCounselling:
✓ Eat balanced diet.
✓ Eat all types of food.
✓ Eat fruits and vegetables in a good amount.
✓ Water is very important for digestion.
translations.MaleEnrolmentToECNotAllowed: Male Enrolment to Eligible Couple not allowed
translations.MaleEnrolmentToPregnancyNotAllowed: Male Enrolment to Pregnancy not allowed
